newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: St George confirms planned Eurostg issue.
newsitem.headline: St George confirms planned Eurostg issue.

text.p: St George Bank Ltd confirmed press reports that it is in the process of preparing the launch of its first public Eurosterling debt issue.
An official for the bank said the issue is still a few weeks away, but added that the transaction is expected to be around 250 million stg and would be lead managed by BZW and UBS.
The debt raising is expected to be in floating rate notes and would be issued off the bank's Euro medium-term programme.
St George's long-term debt is rated single A by Standard & Poor's Corp and A3 by Moody's Investors Service.
